entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add IComparable to MemberInfo #58842
  • Validator does not validate annotated fields of a record type in .Net 6 #58839
  • New X509Chain status code "DuplicateExtension" in Monterey beta 8 #58833
  • FltToInt: OverflowException in Debug and no exception in Release #58832
    6.0.0
  • EventLog tests failing on Windows 11 #58829
  • System.Text.Json.Tests crashing on Mono #58828
  • JIT: assert in morph implicit tail call validation #58827
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix "Clean" target for build, and publish #58826
    6.0.0
  • JIT: recursive inline detection using IL code address is not reliable #58824
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.TryGetSpan(IEnumerable<T> enumerable, out ReadOnlySpan<T> span); #58821
  • dotnet core dump on linux cant show method name #58818
  • Source-build encounters circular PublishBuilder dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58816
  • Questions about requirements for the new SocketsHttpHandler #58814
  • DataAnnotations UrlAttribute validating Url incorrectly #58813
  • [wasm] Test failure Dispose_DisposingHandlerCancelsActiveOperationsWithoutResponses - ERR_CONTENT_LENGTH_MISMATCH #58812
  • Consider obsoleting SocketsHttpHandler.Properties #58805
  • .NET 6.0 does not support OLEDB #58795
  • Blazor AOT compilation runs out of memory, is extremely slow, results in a giant website #58792
  • [tvOS] Environment.GetSpecialFolder is too eager in creating the special directories #58787
    6.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter caused by not always resizing its stack appropriately #58786
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'optLoopTable[i].lpContainedBy in windows arm64 pgo libraries stress test #58785
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 : Aes.EncryptEcb one-shot is slower than ICryptoTransform.TransformFinalBlock #58784
  • attribute not work in dynamic module when marshal #58783
  • Test hang: System.Net.Tests.SimpleHttpTests.ListenerRestart_Success #58782
    Future
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/pauseonstart/pauseonstart/pauseonstart.sh #58781
  • Changes to src/libraries/Native not considered coreclr changes #58779

Closed

  • .NET SDK RC* Produces Exception in Syncfusion Control #58469
  • Https against invalid domain names (containing underscores) behaves differently on Linux than Windows and macOS #58722
    7.0.0
  • regex: different behavior between .NET Framework and .NET Core #58757
  • Introduction of JsonTypeInfo <TValue> in one of the Serialize overloads breaks the code in .net 6 #58817
    6.0.0
  • macOS (Xamarin): failure to build X509Chain #57630
  • CS0759 and CS8795 with LoggerMessageAttribute and single-line "namespace" - the autogenerated code doesn't pick up the namespace. #58790
  • ASP.Net Core 5.0 Web App SOAP WSDL connection error? #58810
  • Multiple disposal possibility in ServiceProvider #58801
  • DotNet 6 Preview 7: Regex.Match and Regex.IsMatch wrong results with startat parameter overload #58794
  • [Mono Android] GC failures on CI #58409
    7.0.0
  • When I run the diagnostic analysis tool, got some warning #58743
  • [ZlibStream] ArgumentOutOfRangeException when passing in compression levels past level 3 (cast from manual enum defining all of the native compression levels). #58742
  • [API Proposal]: Implicit Guid Conversion to string #58798
  • [HTTP/2] Send RST_STREAM instead EOF if request has Content-Length, but body is not sent #58498
    7.0.0
  • [net6.0-android] HttpClient.ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback throws 'Arg_PlatformNotSupported' #57537
    6.0.0
  • HttpClient still forcing spaces into Accept headers #30171
    7.0.0
  • Tests time out: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DnsEndPointTest - mostly on SLES.15 in release/6.0 branches #57929
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add further validation to EmailAddressAttribute #58777
  • System.Text.Json source generator not handling converter factories correctly #58267
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Port fix python path from main branch #58843
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #58841
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Use less calls for MoveDirectory #58840
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58836
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Create a separate RuntimeConfig test for Android and add incremental build #58835
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ignore the DuplicateExtension status from macOS 12. #58834
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Make Float-to-Integer conversions compatible with x86 #58831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [build] Bump XHarness version #58830
    area-Infrastructure
  • [tasks] [net472] Add ProjectReferences to JsonToItemsTaskFactory #58825
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix Windows 8 detection in Pbkdf2 #58823
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Add JitStress=1/2 runs to jitstress-isas-x86 pipeline #58822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect SIMD temp allocation for Vector256 with AVX2 disabled #58820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix reporting of live var ranges after callf+always pairs #58815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use non-deprecated Android Helix queue #58809
  • Change PKCS12 password to assist with credscan #58807
    area-System.Security, test enhancement, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix short branches #58806
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Coalesce live var ranges right before reporting #58803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove MonoAssemblyContextKind MONO_ASMCTX_ enum #58802
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • CreateDirectory: eliminate some syscalls. #58799
    area-System.IO
  • Fix x86 EH for UnmanagedCallersOnly methods #58796
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Deallocate resources for DacDbiArrayList with a matching deallocator #58791
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Removed ! operations from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel (DependencyContextJsonReader.cs) #58789
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [tvOS] Be less eager in creating the non-existent special folders #58788
    area-System.IO, os-tvos, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] trying to use build publish items directly #58780
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Add explicit APIs to Double/Single/Half/TimeOnly #58774
    area-System.Numerics, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support duplicated type names with src gen #58766
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Update branding for 5.0.11 #58760
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Upgrade to net7.0 and remove target frameworks #58011
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Windows 8 detection. #58736
    area-System.Security
  • More cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #58462
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Always write sample events in EventPipe based on sample frequency. #58761
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [release/6.0] Make sure EventPipe streaming thread won't write session->streaming_thread after session free. #58710
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Use `BitOperations.Log2` in SortedSet. #58793
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Send RST_STREAM instead EOF when sending request body is cancelled #58548
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Change namespace of embedded Cecil in ILStrip task #58764
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Change namespace of embedded Cecil in ILStrip task #58763
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58508
    area-System.Net.Http, os-android, 6.0.0
  • Update both TPN files with missing notices #57300
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • Fix JitDump crash #58778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix detection of unsupported links #58399
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Stop using ERR_GET_FUNC, since it has been removed in OSSL3 Beta2. #57879
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #58669
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] The signal enum in the native library should match the managed code. #58682
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix source generation support for tuples with explicitly named elements #58723
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58617
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add `JitEnregStats` complus. #58776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #58410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58672
    area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.x
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58728
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Reflection nullability API: improve test coverage, fix bug found #58479
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    area-System.Reflection
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    area-System.IO
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Tests` #57422
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.EnvironmentVariables` #57433
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • add W11 test queue #58570
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Disable test parallelization in installer tests #58604
    area-HostModel
  • Use XHarnessApkToTest to create helix work items for runtime tests when running on Android #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused test libraries in baseservices/threading #58668
    area-System.Threading
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue diagnostic warnings when context types don't indicate serializable types #58768
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Throw on unsupported types in src gen #58775
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] Support aot without trimming #58306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Refactor symmetric one-shots for improved performance #58270
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • System.Net.Ping: Skip TimeoutIsRespected test if network is unreachable #58745
    area-System.Net
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Update libraries helix matrix #58637
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • only cache credentials on success #58594
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Allow contained indirections in tailcalls on x64 #58686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • First round of converting System.Data.OleDb to COMWrappers #54822
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [MonoVM] Report original DLL name when P/Invoke lookup fails #58206
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • [wasm] WebSocket perf test #58730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_MUL_LONG` for ARM64 #57926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Consider finally that jumps to itself as non-empty #58771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add perfmap debug directory entry to crossgen2 output as needed #58552
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • cleanup namespaces and folder structure of new regex engine #1534

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] LINK : fatal error LNK1123 #1436
  • Does ARM now supported by ObjWriter? #1526

PullRequests

Created

  • Compile NativeAOT on x86 #1531

Merged

  • Move SRM construction to be behind RegexRunnerFactory abstraction #1533
  • Delete indirections #1532
    area-NativeAOT
  • generalized most SRM unit tests to None and Compiled #1525
  • Move to using the new Roslyn IIncrementalGenerator API for better in-VS performance #1374
    area-DllImportGenerator
  • More cleanup for Regex SRM #1529
  • Add `/guard:cf` flavor of bootstrapper #1523
    area-NativeAOT
  • Add ARM support to packaging build #1530

Updated

  • Refactor DllImportGenerator project for easier extensibility #1119
    area-DllImportGenerator
  • Cleanup after moving from CoreRT repo #1527

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Define NET5_0_WINDOWS when TargetFramework is net5.0-windows #20825
  • IPV6 stack is required for .NET 5 #20808
  • Unable to clean project compiled on another machine #20797
  • Global tool installer (ToolPackageUninstaller) hides meaningful error message in case of file lock #20786
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web global using statements break Serilog/NLog/log4net consumers on upgrade #20747

Closed

  • Workload garbage collection failure when installing maui workload a second time (MSI based install) #20309
  • Downloading workload install packs to cache gives different results depending on whether workload is installed #20285
  • `--no-cache` option to `dotnet workload install` doesn't seem to ignore all caches #20286
  • Downloading workload packs to cache should support specifying a different RuntimeIdentifier #20307
    7.0.1xx
  • Downloading workload packs to cache folder should not re-download packages which are already in that folder #20308
    7.0.1xx
  • missing dependency Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten #20683
  • Workload installation creates inaccessible folders when running as standard user #20691
  • Auto add all reference assemblies for PCL targets #476
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException when using PrivateAssets = "All" #8789
  • dotnet publish PublishProfile does not work #20798
  • `--prune` to uninstall all SDKs and runtimes except for the latest version #9621
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Release 6.0.1xx] [PackageValidation] Improve warnings about references when running PackageValidation in a project after packaging it. #20822
    Servicing-consider, Area-Compatibility
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BeforeCommon.targets #20809
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support multi-targeting for Roslyn components #20793
    Area-NetSDK
  • [main] Add targeting pack VS.Redist dependencies #20792
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add targeting pack VS.Redist dependencies #20791
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • [Blazor] Respect BlazorWebAssemblyLoadAllGlobalizationData in hosted projects during publish #20800
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump System.Text.RegularExpressions from 4.3.0 to 4.3.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/DesktopAppWithLibrary-PackagesConfig/TestApp #19513
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Opt into the RAR precomputed cache #19910
  • Adding issue templates for repo [skip ci] #20413
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use null-coalescing assignment operator #20678
  • Disable main loc build while release/6.0.1xx is running #20648
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • Only warn about references that are actually needed at runtime #20567
    Area-Compatibility
  • Make ICUDataMode less prone to accidental breakage #20781
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Restore preferred packages functionality #19878
    Area-NuGet
  • [Razor] Fix casing issue when matching projects to configurations (#20603) #20770
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Fixes packing on multitargeting projects (#20609) #20771
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Ensure the manifest is not generated when there are no assets or discovery patterns (#20607) #20766
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Fixes packing on multitargeting projects #20609
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Fix casing issue when matching projects to configurations #20603
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Ensure the manifest is not generated when there are no assets or discovery patterns #20607
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #20731
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add self contained short flag #19681
  • Blazor AOT Cache Busting #20630
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • Update `dotnet watch` description #20489
    Area-Watch
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Champion "Constant interpolated strings" #2951
    10.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add missing semicolon #5165

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSharpUseRangeOperatorDiagnosticAnalyzer should handle Substring(0, index) #56269
  • Assert throwing while building dotnet/runtime #56268
  • Uncomment Selection Auto Formats #56267
    Backlog
  • Code Cleanup Appears to Format Document Even Though It is Not Configured to do So #56260
  • Incorrect 'is not null there' hint #56259
  • Diagnostic analyzer runner is unavailable on NetCore OOP #56254
  • Add API to clone document/project from one solution snapshot to another #56253
  • Generator driver cache does not cache all inputs #56249
  • BUG Visual Studio and String Interpolation in Visual Basic #56248
    Backlog
  • VS 2022 preview 3.1: Xamarin intellisense hints not updated after code changes #56247
    Backlog
  • String concatenation is incorrect in .net 6 preview 7 #56246
  • C# completion: Completion fails for locals if followed by local function #56245
    Backlog
  • Process terminated. System.InvalidOperationException: Operation is not valid due to the current state of the object. #56244
  • Bug of default target-type inference #56241

Closed

  • Cannot load Microsoft.CodeAnalyzers #54942
    17.0
  • MSBuildWorkspace compilation errors for netcoreapp31/net5.0 'The type or namespace name 'System' could not be found' #53906
    17.0
  • Add F1 help service for codestyle options in .editorconfig #48433
    17.0
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces SymbolFinder.FindReferencesAsync NullReferenceException #56133
    17.0
  • [MemberNotNull] isn't respected on local functions #56256
  • Formatting doesn't work on multiline object initializer #56003
  • Unable to use RoslynCodeTaskFactory in MAC #56164
  • Partial simple program doesn't apply any attributes on `Main` method #56217

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle projects added during break state #56266
    Area-Interactive, 17.0
  • Fix crash in FindReferences #56265
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1350056 #56261
    auto-merge
  • Null annotate preview generation #56258
    Area-IDE
  • Fix access violation when MemoryMappedFile is disposed #56255
    Area-IDE
  • Expose C# formatting service to Razor via external access #56251
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Options persistent storage #56237
    Area-IDE
  • Infer delegate type from lambda expression with explicit return statements #56236
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56263
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56264
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56262
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove declaration-only-compilation from CompilationTracker #56139
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Null annotate IDocumentNavigationService #56257
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix crash when comparing tuples in symbolequivalence #56252
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56242
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Flip driver cache from opt-out to opt-in #56250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56240
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56238
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56239
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Stop marking main-vs-deps insertion PR as draft #56227
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Avoid telemetry for unavoidable XmlException #56221
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56209
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56234
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56272
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56271
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56270
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Set analyzers `global_level` to `-99`. #55472
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Include ref info for parameters > 16 in synthesized delegate type name #56233
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Merge all source generator state in CompilationTracker into a helper type. #56229
    Area-IDE
  • Move VS lsp client implementation to EditorFeatures for VSMac #56051
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Move Static Members: Existing type #56131
    Area-IDE
  • Preserve conversions on null literals before nullable type argument reinference #56022
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Decouple Workspace.Dispose #48068
    Area-IDE
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WSS Closure Immediately after KeepAlive #36308
  • DotNet watch should not trigger itself #36306
  • Replace `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzer.Testing` with `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing` #36300
  • Run Blazor Server app using dotnet watch, the second counter loses its state(resets count to 0) when IncrementAmount attribute is added to the first counter. #36299
  • SignalR Java client: disposing Completable returned by HubConnection.start() does nothing #36298
  • Startup improvement: fortunes #36295
  • Startup regression: json #36294
  • If-None-Match and If-Modified-Since headers not being process by .NET 6 on VS 2022 #36291
  • Custom app_offline.htm #36289
  • Fix bootstrap version validation in identity ui #36288
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WebAssembly .Net Core Hosted - Delete temp file after its downloaded to the browser #36282
  • ControllerEndpointRoute API Comment Misunderstood #36279

entry.content:

Created

    6.0.0

Closed

    6.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Disabling EventLogsPipeUnitTests.TestLogsWildcardCategory and EventCounterTriggerTests.EventCounterTriggerWithEventPipePipelineTest #2569

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sharing of transaction fails on execution strategy retry #25946
  • Query: SqlConstantExpression should have ctor which takes value and type #25943
  • Migrations do not fully qualify types, resulting in compile errors #25933
  • Always encrypted numeric column is considered as decimal #25932
  • dotnet-ef requires x64 SDK on macOS Monterey with Apple Silicon (M1) #25927
  • Store value generator types/factories in the the model and remove the selector #25926
  • Comparison with TimeSpanToStringConverter doesn't work correctly for 1 day+ TimeSpans #25920

Closed

  • Change logging of unused index events from Info to Debug #24981
    6.0.0-rc2
  • EF Core 5.0.1 problem with enum store in tinyint #23858
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Terminate flag ignored when scripting a create table in SqlServerMigrationsSqlGenerator #24254
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Update SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.2 to 2.0.4 in EFCore 3.1.* #25497
    3.1.20
  • SnapshotFactoryFactory assumes wrong type for snapshot expression body #25259
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Validate that filters are the same for shared indexes #24968
    6.0.0-rc2
  • ValueGeneratorCache holds scoped ValueGeneratorSelector references #24637
    6.0.0-rc2
  • When lazy-loading fails the property flag in LazyLoader is still marked as loaded #23165
    6.0.0-rc2
  • FirstOrDefault after custom projection == null cannot be translated #18476
    6.0.0-rc2
  • ChangeTracker.DebugView crashes when 2 Entities with different Id Types share the same OwnedEntity #25311
    6.0.0-preview7
  • Allow EFCore [Required]-Attribute to be nullable #25935
  • Replace the link of the "The LINQ expression could not be translated" exception #24996
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Stack overflow when saving multiple modified entities with the same key #23043
    6.0.0-rc2
  • entry.OriginalValues.SetValues swallows error #22968
    6.0.0-rc2
  • NavigationFixer.SetForeignKeyProperties doesn't set value as StoreGenerated #22603
    6.0.0-rc2
  • "Unable to cast object of type 'System.Single' to type 'System.Double'." thrown when querying entity that contains property Double with some custom precision/scale values #22572
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Store all enums as string global configuration #25929
  • How can I abort a running EF Core Query using GetAsyncEnumerator? #23652
  • Scaffold error when two indexes exist on the same column set #11846
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Chained options for GenerateProviderOptions() throws error #19780
    6.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to R&D pools on main #25944
  • Migrations: Honor [Column(Order)] in CreateTable operation #25942
  • Fixup to index filter validation #25939
  • More links to conceptual docs #25937

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25924
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Change logging level for non-created indexes from Info to Warn #25928
  • Query: Convert enum value to integer when printing constant as needed #25940
  • Query: Use cancellationToken appropriately #25918
  • Remove factory from value generator cache key #25925
  • Add convert node to snapshot expression when needed #25936
  • Query: Convert SingleResult compared to null to Any #25914
  • Validate same filters in duplicate indexes #25931
  • Don't mark property as loaded in lazy-loader if lazy-loading fails #25898
  • Support no termination in SQL Server CREATE TABLE migration operation #25911
  • Read double as float on SQL Server when precision is less than 25 #25881
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25922
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #25913
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #25912
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Avoid stack overflow when saving multiple modified entities with the same key #25897
  • Allow setting original/current values using a typed dictionary #25895
  • Store store-generated FK values in the store-generated snapshot #25894
  • [release/3.1] Update SQLite dependencies to 2.0.4 #25550
    Servicing-approved, 3.1.20
  • Remove MethodCallCodeFragment constructor accepting a chained call #25910
  • Add test for scaffolding multiple indexes on the same column #25917
